00027 void MessageCallback(const asSMessageInfo *msg, void *param)
00028 {
00029     const char *type = "ERR ";
00030     if ( msg->type == asMSGTYPE_WARNING )
00031         type = "WARN";
00032     else if ( msg->type == asMSGTYPE_INFORMATION )
00033         type = "INFO";
00034 
00035     char buff[512];
00036 
00037     sprintf(buff, "%s (%d, %d) : %s : %s", msg->section, msg->row, msg->col, type, msg->message);
00038     Utils::get()->writeToLog("Script Manager MSG " + ((string)buff));
00039 }
00040 
00041 void print(string s)
00042 {
00043     GuiManager::get()->writeToConsole(s);
00044 }

00046 ScriptManager* ScriptManager::manager(NULL);

00048 ScriptManager::ScriptManager()
00049 {
00050     // Create the script engine
00051     engine = asCreateScriptEngine(ANGELSCRIPT_VERSION);
00052 
00053     // The script compiler will write any compiler messages to the callback.
00054     engine->SetMessageCallback(asFUNCTION(MessageCallback), 0, asCALL_CDECL);
00055 
00056     context = engine->CreateContext();
00057 
00058     rManager = new hgeResourceManager(0);
00059 
00060     // Register the script string type
00061     RegisterScriptString(engine);
00062     RegisterScriptStringUtils(engine);
00063 
00064     int r = 0;
00065     r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("void print(const string &in)", asFUNCTION(print), asCALL_CDECL); assert (r >= 0);
00066 }
00067 
00068 ScriptManager::~ScriptManager()
00069 {
00070     rManager->Purge();
00071     context->Release();
00072     engine->Release();
00073     manager = NULL;
00074 }

00077 {
00078     return engine;
00079 }

00082 {
00083     return context;

00087 {

00091 void ScriptManager::addBindings(ScriptBinder* binder)
00092 {
00093     binder->bind(engine);
00094     delete binder;
00095 }

00097 void ScriptManager::executeScript(string fName)
00098 {
00099     int r;
00100 
00101     // We will load the script from a file on the disk.
00102     FILE *f = fopen(fName.c_str(), "rb");
00103     if ( f == 0 )
00104     {
00105         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Failed to open the script " + fName + ".");
00106         SystemManager::get()->quitNextUpdate();
00107     }
00108 
00109     // Determine the size of the file
00110     fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
00111     int len = ftell(f);
00112     fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
00113 
00114     // On Win32 it is possible to do the following instead
00115     // int len = _filelength(_fileno(f));
00116 
00117     // Read the entire file
00118     string script;
00119     script.resize(len);
00120     int c =     fread(&script[0], len, 1, f);
00121     fclose(f);
00122 
00123     if ( c == 0 )
00124     {
00125         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Failed to load script file " + fName + ".");
00126         SystemManager::get()->quitNextUpdate();
00127     }
00128     asIScriptModule* mod = engine->GetModule(fName.c_str(), asGM_ALWAYS_CREATE);
00129     r = mod->AddScriptSection(fName.c_str(), &script[0], len);
00130     if ( r < 0 )
00131     {
00132         Utils::get()->writeToLog("AddScriptSection() failed");
00133         SystemManager::get()->quitNextUpdate();
00134     }
00135     r = mod->Build();
00136     if ( r < 0 )
00137     {
00138        Utils::get()->writeToLog("Build() of " + fName + " failed.");
00139         SystemManager::get()->quitNextUpdate();
00140     }
00141     mod->BindAllImportedFunctions();
00142 
00143     r = mod->GetFunctionIdByName("main");
00144     if (r >= 0)
00145     {
00146         context->Prepare(r);
00147         context->Execute();
00148     }
00149 }

00151 void ScriptManager::loadResourceScript(string fName)
00152 {
00153     rManager->LoadScript(fName.c_str());
00154 }

00156 int ScriptManager::getFuncID(string moduleName, string funcName)
00157 {
00158     return engine->GetModule(moduleName.c_str(), asGM_ONLY_IF_EXISTS)->GetFunctionIdByName(funcName.c_str());
00159 }

00161 ScriptManager* ScriptManager::get()
00162 {
00163     if (manager == NULL)
00164         manager = new ScriptManager();
00165 
00166     return manager;
00167 }
